ABOUT ME

My name is Miloš Branković and I am a frontend web developer. I believe that excellent user experience is crucial in today's web and I like to commit all my effort in generating such an experience.

I have worked with many frontend technologies and I am most comfortable with React, because it has great powers and scalability. Clean and well organised code makes me satisfied and I always want to write my code as clean and as maintainable as possible, as it gives long-term benefits.

I love experimenting with technologies I am already good at and I also search for growth outside of the comfort zone and find it exciting to learn new tools and technologies I still don't master.

PROJECTS

BLACKJACK

This is a classical casino game developed with React components and Redux for state management (managing deck of cards, shuffling, dealing, managing bets...). The app is styled with Scss and everything is bundeled up with Webpack.

As a player, you start with 3000$ 'cash'. Play as long as you want and refresh the page when you lose money.
Enjoy!

React.js
Redux
JavaScript
SCSS
HTML
Webpack
REACT WEATHER APP

This web app was developed using React.js and React Router. It has 3 routes: one for current locaiton weather, one for searching for any city, and one for weather in Serbia in five cities. Weather data is retrieved from the Open weather map API.

The background changes according to the weather in current location (if the user alows location info). When a user clicks on a city name, he can get detailed wheather info for five days in a chart. The chart data shows weather data for every 3 hours in the next five days, as well as temperature and precipitation curves.

React.js
React Router
AJAX
JavaScript
Chart.js
SCSS
HTML
Webpack
TIC-TAC-TOE

This game was developed using React.js. It is a well-known game students play on boring school classes.

The player can choose to play against a computer or against another player.

React.js

REACT CALCULATOR

This is a simple calculator developed using React.js. It is adapted for use with keyboard and mouse. The calculator utilizes formula logic and observes order of operation precedence.

You can work with decimal and also negative numbers. There are also options for clearing entry and deleting wrongly inputted characters.

React.js
JavaScript
SCSS
HTML
Webpack
WIKIPEDIA VIEWER

This app uses Wikipedia API to search for articles. Wikipedia returns up to 10 matching results. The user can see title of the article, picture if there is any, and intro text from the article.

jQuery
